Okari are a large race of good natured giants. Attuned to nature and
people, they are often considered the friendliest and greatest of friends.
They reside in the mountains and foothills of the mountain range known as
Aludria's Tears. These mountains are rumored to be created by the goddess of
life tears falling from the heavens upon the land. The mountains are giant
rolling hills lush with life. All manner of plants and animals reside within
these large rounded mountains. It is also rumored that a large lake hidden
within the mountains is filled with the last of Aludria's Tears, and any who
drink from it will live a extraordinaryly long life by taking years off your
life. Of course such a wonderful lake is also said to be guarded by the a
beast created by the god of death, Nephium. Okari are ruled by a council of
elders that govern their society. Okari and dwarves are good friends and are
often seen within each other's cities as the dwarves live beneath the
mountains that the Okari inhabit. Even though they appear exact opposites in
appearance and mannerism Dwarves and Okari get on famously well. Of course
it is hard not to get along with the Okari no matter who you are. Okari
stand anywhere from 7'5" to 9'0" tall and are quite thick. They are
extremely strong and hardy, although a bit slow and clumsy. They live a long
time altough not as long as an Elf. They are almost always jolly and
practically impossible to anger, but if and when they are they are
considered mightest of opponents. They are extremely religous and worship
Aludria and Nephium with equal revere, for they understand that death is
merely apart of life. Their hair and eye colors vary as much as humans,
although their skin color is always a healthy bronze color.
